text: Uye Muhammad (SAW) haasi asi mutumwa, uye zvirokwazvo vatumwa (vakawanda) vakapfuura mushure make. Kana akafa kana kuuraiwa, muchafuratira here nezvitsitsinho zvenyu (muchiramba kutenda)? Uye uyo anofuratira nezvitsitsinho zvake, hapana kana chinokuvadza chaangaite kuna Allah; uye Allah vachapa mubairo kuAsh-Shaakiroon (avo vanotenda)
